Blog.post: well what up foolios... haha BITCHES i know i know i havent posted in a lonnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnng time so I'm going to try and get back up there and post once every 3 days hopefully - i felt it was necessarry to get a post up for the passing of a great man Rick James Bitch he passed away last night according to my inside source (Amaresh) - well anyways i have moved into my new house which really rules because it has a dock in the backyard that opens up onto a huge ass lake, but unfortunately i do no have a boat or jetski or even a tire to float around in - ahhhh well i have been leading numerous capers to copy dvd's without paying but none have been successful cus my dvd burner blows ass so w/e - wireless router got replaced so i am no broadcasting from my room so ill be online whenever you ppl holler at a playa - found an awesome site that lets you download virtually any live show or music video from different servers ( urlLink www.videopimp.com and urlLink www.mirc.com or urlLink www.mirc.net ) - Daag put up some music servers so i have been downloading his music so thats cool - my Taft boarding school booklets and permissions and all that good stuff came so i read over that shit which took a while but im REALLY hyped about school and seeing an old friend (Reid Longley); i read all 76 pages of the book twice so i am fully knowledgable what kind of pets i can have at school - hmmm what else ah yes there is absolutely nothing to eat in my house and no where to go because West Virginia blows ass - uhhhh got my mp3 player replaced so Ill be jammin soon ----> missing everyone at tip right now and hoping to hear from them all - Bizzyd572 or urlLink hydawood@lovett.org peace

Yea so i didnt have a title but ill get a good one some day; anyways i added a bunch of people to the BLOG so i think this will start to get quite large :) also Maggie and I have started to open a bunch of TIP chat rooms on a daily basis and yesterday we had Marc and Daag in there so it got quite Crunk; - I dont know about the rest of you but I'm feeling pretty bad still about no more TIP so drop me a line if you want in on a Chat so we can reminisce about the good ol' days. and AIM me at bizzyd572 if you want in on this little BLOG, all you need is an email address

I'm going through major tip withdrawal. I've played Scotty Doesn't Know like literally 50 times today and my cousin that at my place thinks I don't know any other music, so he came and handed me like 10 cd's and he was like you should play these. Today's my first day home since I had to go up to DC, so it feels like Sunday, the day after...and I just feel sad all round. A last thanks to all you great tipsters for making my 4th year the best at our crazy crunk campus. We're gonna have a bunch of reunions everywhere and tipsters must keep in touch this year. SCOTTY DOESN'T KNOW

I hope we can get a lot of people on this thing, TIP '04 should never die! btw, I'm Russell. Most of you should know me, but I was the kinda-short 4th year with blonde highlights and brown eyes. Not Carter or that Eye of the Tiger dude though.

I hope I spelled that right, because I take French, not German. Anyhoo, I have arrived at the blog, and will try to do something in my account so that you guys may be able to remember me. For those of you who don't know me, check DRag's page. I am Robbie "Dobbie" Cameron, the guy being thrown out the window. On that note, rock out, and never let TIP die! -Do what now?
Oh yea i forgot my AIM Screen name is voodoodaddy26. IM me please!
